titles.title: Honoring the life, service, and accomplishments of Lieutenant General Victor H. Krulak, United States Marine Corps.
Honoring the life, service, and accomplishments of Lieutenant General Victor H. Krulak, United States Marine Corps.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: Honors Lieutenant General Victor H. Krulak, United States Marine Corps, for his 34 years of exemplary military service and commends him for his dedication and commitment as an infantry officer and leader of Marines.
